column3: R Workshop for Social Scientists Schedule - Video Links

column7: This video will describe the layout of Rstudio and will get you oriented to the platform.
A longer introduction to RStudio with a little more time spent writing code and exploring the content that will be in each of the four panels in Rstudio.
Probably best for supplemental info - goes deep into functions students might not know, using dplyr and tidyr
This is useful but it is 17 min long
